shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity
Class SimilarityMeasure

java.lang.Object
  shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.SimilarityMeasure
Direct Known Subclasses:
PathMeasure
public abstract class SimilarityMeasure
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract notion of a similarity measure that all provided implementations extend.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood

public SimilarityMeasure()
Method Detail

getFromCache

protected final java.lang.Double getFromCache(net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s1,
                                              net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s2)
Get a previously computed similarity between two synsets from the cache.

Parameters:
s1 - the first synset between which we are looking for the similarity.
s2 - the other synset between which we are looking for the similarity.
Returns:
The similarity between the two sets or null if it is not in the cache.

addToCache

protected final double addToCache(net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s1,
                                  net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s2,
                                  double sim)
Add a computed similarity between two synsets to the cache so that we don't have to compute it if it is needed in the future.

Parameters:
s1 - one of the synsets between which we are storring a similarity.
s2 - the other synset between which we are storring a similarity.
sim - the similarity between the two supplied synsets.
Returns:
the similarity score just added to the cache.

config

protected abstract void config(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Configures the similarity measure using the supplied parameters.

Parameters:
params - a set of key-value pairs that are used to configure the similarity measure. See concrete implementations for details of expected/possible parameters.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while configuring the similarity measure.

newInstance

public static SimilarityMeasure newInstance(java.net.URL confURL)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Create a new instance of a similarity measure.

Parameters:
confURL - the URL of a configuration file. Parameters are specified one per line as key:value pairs.
Returns:
a new instance of a similairy measure as defined by the supplied configuration URL.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while creating the similarity measure.

newInstance

public static SimilarityMeasure newInstance(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a new instance of a similarity measure using the supplied parameters.

Parameters:
params - a set of key-value pairs which define the similarity measure.
Returns:
the newly created similarity measure.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while creating the similarity measure.

getSimilarity

public abstract double getSimilarity(net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s1,
                                     net.didion.jwnl.data.Synset s2)
                              throws net.didion.jwnl.JWNLException
This is the method responsible for computing the similarity between two specific synsets. The method is implemented differently for each similarity measure so see the subclasses for detailed information.

Parameters:
s1 - one of the synsets between which we want to know the similarity.
s2 - the other synset between which we want to know the similarity.
Returns:
the similarity between the two synsets.
Throws:
net.didion.jwnl.JWNLException - if an error occurs accessing WordNet.

getSimilarity

public final SimilarityInfo getSimilarity(java.lang.String w1,
                                          java.lang.String w2)
                                   throws net.didion.jwnl.JWNLException
Get the similarity between two words. The words can be specified either as just the word or in an encoded form including the POS tag and possibly the sense number, i.e. cat#n#1 would specifiy the 1st sense of the noun cat.

Parameters:
w1 - one of the words to compute similarity between.
w2 - the other word to compute similarity between.
Returns:
a SimilarityInfo instance detailing the similarity between the two words specified.
Throws:
net.didion.jwnl.JWNLException - if an error occurs accessing WordNet.
